embeds.title: ❗️ Action Required for `${new_branch}` ❗️
embeds.description: [sunnypilot](${PUBLIC_REPO_URL}): Workflow [#${GITHUB_RUN_NUMBER}](${PUBLIC_REPO_URL}/actions/runs/${GITHUB_RUN_ID}) of branch [${new_branch}](${PUBLIC_REPO_URL}/tree/${new_branch}) by ${GITHUB_ACTOR} is ready to publish manually as [${new_branch}](${PUBLIC_REPO_URL}/tree/${new_branch})
